DOC.brief_summary: This study 's aim evaluate diagnostic accuracy transperineal ultrasound assessment compare speculum examination , nitrazine placental micro globulin-1 test .
DOC.detailed_description: Women early late preterm pregnancy complaint fluid leakage enrol study . Prior speculum examination , sagittal view birth canal transverse view cervix fornix obtain transperineal technique image store . Then speculum examination pooling , nitrazine test placental microglobulin-1 test perform result record . Ultrasound image analyse observer blind physical examination finding . Hypoechogenic fluid appearance adequate size around cervix fornix consider positive . Placental microglobulin-1 test use reference . Sensitivity specificity value calculate test .
DOC.criteria: Women early late preterm pregnancy , ( i.e. , woman 24th 37th week gestation ) Pregnant woman complaint fluid leakage Women term pregnancy ( i.e. , woman 37th week gestation ) Women unviable pregnancy ( i.e. , woman 24th week gestation ) Women active labor ( i.e. , cervical dilatation 4cm admission ) Women vaginal bleeding
